entry.title: Feasibility of showing a popup warning in standard Fiori app F298 when changes made through custom.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In the standard Fiori app Manage Memo Record (F298), the Company Code field has an F4 help. We have a requirement where, after a certain time (for example, post 7 PM), whenever a user selects a value from the F4 help, a popup warning message should be displayed on the Fiori side.

Since this is a standard app, custom changes have been made in the backend odata services I would like to know:

What is the feasibility of implementing this?
 How can this be handled

Has anyone implemented a similar scenario where custom popup logic is triggered in a standard app?

Any guidance or best practices would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: sort does not work in UI.PresentationVariant
entry.content:
Hello community,

I would like to sort the list based on createdAt.

Bellow is part of  manifest and part of annotation.cds. No matter what I try I can not make list to be sorted.

API does no include sort either.

Any clue will help a lot. Thanks!

 

 

views": {
                "paths": [
                  {
                    "key": "tab1",
                    "annotationPath": "com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.SelectionVariant#variant1",
                    "presentationVariant": "com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.PresentationVariant#SortByCreatedAt"
                  },
....
UI.PresentationVariant #SortByCreatedAt: {

                Descending  : true,
            },
        ],        
        Visualizations  : ['@UI.LineItem'],
    },

entry.title: Unable to access apps in launchpad- sap/bc/ui2/startup 403 forbidden status code
entry.content:
I am unable to access any of the apps in production , getting the below mentioned error.

 
An error occurred while loading this page. This might have happened due to one of the following reasons: - The page or space has been removed or is no longer assigned to you. - The URL might be corrupt. Among other things, this might be caused by a corrupt bookmark. Please copy the complete error message by using the Copy button below and contact your content administrator. PageId: "SAP_BASIS_PG_UI_FLP" SpaceId: "SAP_BASIS_SP_UI_FLP"

Symptom

  • Fiori Launchpad does not display any tiles even when the user has correct application roles assigned.
  • Fiori Launcpad search fails with error:

App could not be opened either due to an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad configuration or a missing role assignment.

Failed to resolve navigation target "#Action-search". This is most likely caused by an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad content configuration or by a missing role assignment.
  • In the network trace of browser developer tool (F12 key) you can see the  /sap/bc/ui2/start_up request returns 403 forbidden.

Imp note--- We recently upgraded to new system, everything seems to be working fine in Dev and QA. All the services needed for launchpad are activated. Basis team downloaded the roles and authorization from production and assigned it to a test user in both dev and qa , everything works fine . issue only lies in production 

Trouble shooting steps we have tried:

1. All the services are active , all the roles are authorizations are same as dev and quality.

2. I referred to sap note '3368272' which describes the exact issue i am facing , there they have given the resolution to change the security requirement in logon data of /ui2/startup node from ssl to standard, whereas everything works fine in development and quality with SSL security requirement.

We have been facing this issue for 2 weeks now , tried everything we could think of , this issue needs to be resolved asap.

Please provide your inputs , what could help.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: SAPUI5 Timeline Component - App Hangs with Busy Indicator Randomly.
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'm developing a custom SAPUI5 application and I'm using the <suite:Timeline> component to display approval history in a cost approval workflow. The data is retrieved using a V2 OData service from the /ProcessLogs endpoint.

📌Problem Description:

The timeline works most of the time, but intermittently, the app gets stuck on the busy indicator (oView.setBusy(true)), and the form becomes completely unresponsive. There is no error in the console, and the issue is not consistently reproducible — it appears randomly.

This issue affects usability as the user cannot continue without refreshing the entire application.

🔧Functional Flow

  1. On opening the form, I call the function onFetchTimelinessData.

  2. It reads from the /ProcessLogs entity using OData V2.

  3. On success, I bind the results to the Timeline control.

  4. The Timeline renders approval status history for that request.

🧩 Code Snippet

VIEW CODE:-
<suite:Timeline
id="detailsTimelinedataADPD"
axisOrientation="Vertical"
showTimeFilter="false"
height="500px"
sort="false"
showItemFilter="false"
enableScroll="true"
growingThreshold="40"
content="{timelinesslogdata>/results}">
<suite:TimelineItem
dateTime="{
parts: ['timelinesslogdata>createdAt', 'timelinesslogdata>remarks'],
formatter: '.formatDateTimeWithRemarks'
}"
title="{
parts: [
'timelinesslogdata>role',
'timelinesslogdata>userName',
'timelinesslogdata>userEmail',
'timelinesslogdata>status'
],
formatter: '.formatTimelineTitle'
}"
text="{timelinesslogdata>remarks}"
userPicture="{timelinesslogdata>userPicture}"
icon="sap-icon://employee-approvals"
status="{timelinesslogdata>status}" />
</suite:Timeline>


CONTROLLER CODE: -

onFetchTimelinessData: function () {
var reqid = this._reqIDData;
var oView = this.getView();
var that = this;
var oModelV2 = this.getOwnerComponent().getModel("approvalservicev2");

oView.setBusy(true); // Busy starts

oModelV2.read("/ProcessLogs", {
filters: [new sap.ui.model.Filter("reqID", sap.ui.model.FilterOperator.EQ, reqid)],
sorters: [new sap.ui.model.Sorter("receivedDt", false)],
success: function (oData) {
oView.setBusy(false); // Busy ends

if (oData && oData.results) {
var aProcessedData = oData.results.map(function (oLog) {
return {
createdAt: oLog.createdAt,
role: oLog.stage ? "[" + oLog.stage + "]" : "[N/A]",
userName: oLog.userName || "Unknown User",
userEmail: oLog.userEmail || "N/A",
remarks: oLog.stage === "Seek Clarification" ? oLog.clarification : oLog.remarks,
status: statusMap[oLog.status?.toUpperCase()] || ""
};
});

var oJSONModel = new sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel({ results: aProcessedData });
oView.setModel(oJSONModel, "timelinesslogdata");
}
},
error: function (oError) {
oView.setBusy(false);
sap.m.MessageToast.show("Failed to load process log data.");
}
});
}

 

 




Despite my efforts, I'm still looking for an effective solution. If anyone has experienced something similar or has expertise in this area, your advice would be greatly valued.

Thank you in advance for your support and time!

entry.title: SAP Fiori F5104A tab "Measuerments" Latest Reading / Measurement Points are not visible
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

i have an issue with the Fiori App F5104A and the tab measurments. I select a Technical Object (FL) and the table below measurement points has no entries. When i click on "All Readings" the measurement Point is shown and the documents for this measurment point.

I createad a measurement document with the same user via IK11 for the measurement point and it works. 

I have searched SAP notes, but i cannot find this issue. Do i have to change some settings in the SPRO? (I found, the issue, that the all readings tab is empty, but my issue is that only the latest reading tab is emtpy...)

 

 

I am grateful for any advice.

Kind regards

Jens

 

SAP: 2022 FPS02 

 

 

Edit / Solution: 

SAP Notes  358047 and 3580763 describe not the exact issue, but after implementing it is solved.

entry.title: Connect to a back-end system from ui5 Custom Middlewares
entry.content:
We have a service called evaluation-ui (this is UI repo code),  and I want to connect it to another service called proxy-service. Both services are in the same space. Below is my setup in the ui5.yaml file.

This setup works fine when using DWC Tooling, but when we deploy the changes to the real server, it does not work."

 

The Content-Security-Policy directive name 
'https://expfeatures-manual-1.dev.us30.onesm.cloud.sap/proxy/hello' contains
 one or more invalid characters. Only ASCII alphanumeric characters or dashes '-' are allowed in directive names.

 

Request URL
https://expfeatures-manual-1.dev.us30.onesm.cloud.sap/proxy/hello
Request Method
GET
Status Code
404 Not Found
Remote Address
35.184.169.79:443
Referrer Policy
strict-origin-when-cross-origin

 

server:
  customMiddleware:
    - name: fiori-tools-proxy
      afterMiddleware: compression
      configuration:
        ignoreCertError: false # If set to true, certificate errors will be ignored. E.g. self-signed certificates will be accepted
        backend:
          - path: /ui/evaluation-srv-ui/v1/evaluation/ProgramService
            url: https://evaluation.cfapps.eu10.hana.ondemand.com
          - path: /proxy
            url: https://1sm-development-us30.cfapps.us30.hana.ondemand.com

following below doc-https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_FIORI_tools/17d50220bcd848aa854c9c182d65b699/dce5315a26964ba59d9f3e7f827dceca.html

entry.title: Top 25 SAP S/4HANA & ABAP Interview Questions and Answers (2025)
entry.content:
Preparing for a SAP ABAP or S/4HANA interview can feel overwhelming. You spend hours revising concepts, yet when the interview starts, the real challenge is remembering which questions are most commonly asked and how to answer them with clarity.

To help you overcome this, I’ve compiled the Top 25 SAP ABAP and S/4HANA Interview Questions for 2025—based on real-world interview experiences and what hiring managers actually look for.

This post curates the most common SAP ABAP & S/4HANA interview questions for 2025—spanning DDIC, ALV, BDC, CDS, AMDP, Open vs Native SQL, ABAP on HANA, Web Dynpro and more. For clear, step-by-step answers, watch the full breakdown here:
👉 Video: Top 25 SAP S/4HANA & ABAP Interview Questions and Answers (2025)

📌 Top 25 SAP ABAP & S/4HANA Interview Questions (2025)

  1. What is SAP ABAP?
  2. What is the ABAP Data Dictionary (DDIC)?
  3. Difference between transparent tables and pooled/cluster tables
  4. What are SmartForms and their benefits over SAP Scripts?
  5. Difference between function modules and BAPIs
  6. What is BDC (Batch Data Communication)? Methods: recording, session, call transaction
  7. What are modularization techniques in ABAP?
  8. Difference between Classical Reports, Interactive Reports, and ALV Reports
  9. What are field symbols and how are they used?
  10. How do you define and use internal tables?
  11. What are the basic data types in ABAP?
  12. What is ABAP Objects (OOP in ABAP)?
  13. Explain inheritance and polymorphism in ABAP Objects
  14. What is a Lock Object? How is locking handled in ABAP?
  15. Open SQL vs Native SQL – differences and use cases
  16. What are RICEFW objects in SAP projects?
  17. Explain CALL TRANSACTION and its use cases
  18. What are CDS Views and their significance in S/4HANA?
  19. What is AMDP (ABAP Managed Database Procedure) and why is it used?
  20. Debugging in ABAP – breakpoints, watchpoints, ST22 dumps
  21. What is Web Dynpro for ABAP?
  22. CDS vs AMDP vs Traditional Reports – when to use which?
  23. What are the key features of ABAP on HANA?
  24. What tools and T-codes are essential for ABAP development?
  25. What are type groups and their purpose in ABAP?

Why this matters in 2025 (How to Crack SAP ABAP Interview)

SAP technology continues to evolve, especially with ABAP on HANA and S/4HANA migrations. Interviewers are no longer just testing textbook knowledge—they want to see if you can connect concepts to real project scenarios. These 25 questions cover exactly that mix of fundamentals + modern ABAP practices.

📽️ For in-depth answers, examples, and explanations, check out the full video:
👉 Top 25 SAP ABAP & S/4HANA Interview Questions and Answers (2025)

💡 Tip: Don’t just memorize these questions—try to explain them in your own words, link them to project experience, and always be ready with a short example. That’s what makes you stand out in interviews.

entry.title: how do I send a request to the SPA workflow from Custom fiori app?
entry.content:
Hi all,
 I'm having an issue with the SAP build process automation.  I created a simple workflow structure and deployed. After, I tested whether  the workflow service on the api.sap site and Postman.   The workflow is working and successfully ı see task in myinbox. 
But when ı try to request from my  custom fiori it gives error.  When I adapt the request in the post, I get a cors error.  So  I thought I definitely needed to send a request through the destination, so I created a destination from the service instance. 
my destination :


After  I described this destinationin xs.app.json file like that

      {
      "source": "^/spalast/(.*)$",
      "target": "/public/workflow/rest/v1/$1",
      "destination": "spa",
      "authenticationType": "none",
      "csrfProtection": false
    },
and lastly my test requests: 

             fetch("/spalast/workflow-instances", {
                method: "POST",
                headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    definitionId: "eu10.integration-suite-dev-25mloa6z.employeeapitriggerprocess.employeeProcess",
                    context: { employee: { /* ... */ } }
                })
            });
              fetch("/spalast/workflow-instances", {
                method: "GET",
                headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }
            });

ıt  gives 403 error  from the POST request and 404 error from the GET request.

What could be the reason for this?  Most of the blogs I read also redirect in this way.

entry.title: 500 Internal Server Error When Saving Change Request in SAP CPM (RESULT_STRUCT Not Filled)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are facing a 500 Internal Server Error when trying to save a change request in SAP Commercial Project Management (CPM).

The error message is:

Issue Details:

  • The change request saves successfully only for one specific user ID.
  • We have verified that roles and business partner data are identical across all users.

What We’ve Tried:
Compared roles using SU01 – no differences found.
Checked personalization settings – all users appear to be configured the same.
Suspect it might be related to BRF+ rules, user-specific data, or missing context during function call.

Looking for Help With:
Has anyone faced this RESULT_STRUCT error in CPM before?
Could this be tied to user-specific personalization or context?
What backend logs or traces should we check to pinpoint the issue?

Any guidance or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks,
Febin

entry.title: How to navigate from fragment to different ObjectPage?
entry.content:
I created a SAP Fiori Elements UI for a CAP service. I want to have a custom section, so I created one. I want to click on a button within the custom section (being a fragment) and it should navigate me to a working target within my app which is defined in my manifest.json.

I really just want to know how normally one should navigate from fragments to an ObjectPage? I don't know how I can get the Router and use the classic navTo functionality. Or if there is another way of doing it.

entry.title: What end-to-end testing tools are best for SAP BTP (BAS) applications with CDS views and SAPUI5?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) projects deployed on SAP BTP that use CDS views as the data model and SAPUI5 for the front end.

I would like to implement end-to-end testing for these applications. I am familiar with general-purpose tools like Playwright or WebdriverIO, but I am not sure if they are the best fit when testing applications in the SAP ecosystem (especially those with CDS/OData services and SAPUI5).

  • Has anyone successfully used Playwright or WebdriverIO for BAS/SAPUI5 projects?

  • Are there recommended frameworks or libraries specifically designed for UI5 applications?

  • What are the best practices for handling such tests?

  • Any tutorials, examples, or community resources you could share?

Thanks in advance for your insights!

entry.title: Decision Step In Workflow screen not showing
entry.content:
I have workflow items configured to show in Fiori My inbox app. User selects one item ie a display a financial document and clicks on Open Task button and it navigates to FBO3 TCode in webgui in browser for user to review document.

Once reviewd and okayed, The user clicks on back button in Tcode  SAP webgui screen but instead of opening expected gray colored webgui decision screen with Approve/Reject/exit button ( PFA screenshot ), it opens blank webgui screen with Close Window button ie navigating to the screen that is supposed to open in end once item is processed.

i have checked in PFTC, pls let me know other settings or what to check in pftc? Help !

entry.title: How to create ODATA v4 POST API where it will take input as a structure and send back array of data
entry.content:
Dear Community,                                                                                                                                                                          I have a requirement where I want take a structure of fields as input and respond back with different structure or array of another structure/data. And this I want to create using ODATA v4 with latest ABAP. 

Can someone help me by providing some working sample piece of code and steps which needs to be followed?

I appreciate your response in advance.

Regards,                                                                                                                                                                             Omkar

entry.title: Is this App 'Create Sales Orders - Automatic Extraction App ID: F4920' Instruction file
entry.content:
Hi,

We are evaluating the FIORI App on S/4HANA on-premise  'Create Sales Orders - Automatic Extraction App ID: F4920'. We need the instructions to setup the communication scenarios for S/4HANA on-premise.

While extracting data from uploaded file, we get error 'Contact your system admin to set up the required communication scenario' 

 

On the SAP Application help Create Sales Orders - Automatic Extraction | SAP Help Portal page , under prerequisite it shows a path to open Create Sales Orders from Unstructured Data (‏4X9‏). 

 

But this takes us to only Solution scenarios for cloud. on which the instructions file cant be downloaded. Process Navigator - SAP for Me 

 

Can anyone provide the instructions to setup the communication scenarios for S/4HANA on-premise.

 

Thanks,

Neha

entry.title: SAP BAS Adaptation Project Layout editor plugin not installed error
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am getting below error, when I am trying to create an extension project using SAP Adaptation Project template.

The Extensibility Project generator plugin was not found in your dev space and it is required for this action. To proceed, please install the <SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility> extension.

My Fiori Dev space contains SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility as a predefined one, but still getting above error.

entry.title: how to avoid the unnecessary js calls in the sap fiori custom application
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently i have created a custom fiori application using just smart filter bar and smart table. But when i try to run the application its calling so many js files in network calls and because of that its taking time load the application. 

We already have component.preload.js file for our application which is added automatically after creating project in BAS.

Please suggest how can i avoid the below calls.

KR,

Anji

entry.title: "Deploying Fiori apps in BAS: Object name syntax error in ABAP Deploy"
entry.content:
Hi Community,

I’m currently working on deploying a Fiori component from SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) to an ABAP backend system using the "npm run deploy" command. However, I’m encountering a persistent deployment error that’s blocking progress.

error abap-deploy-task Z_SGM_RRB This syntax cannot be used for an object name

I noticed the deployment log mentions issues with .xlsx files not being recognized, so I have created ". Ui5RepositoryBinaryFiles". After including the file there is no error with excel files and they being recognized.

Has anyone faced this issue before? How can I fix the problem, so the deployment succeeds?

Thanks in advance for any help!
